撞.definition: to knock against; to bump into; to run into; to meet by accident

撞倒.definition: to knock down; to knock over; to run over (sb)

撞大運.definition: to have a lucky stroke; to try one's luck

撞擊.definition: to strike; to hit; to ram

撞擊式印表機.pinyin: zhuang4 ji1 shi4 yin4 biao3 ji1

撞擊式打印機.pinyin: zhuang4 ji1 shi4 da3 yin4 ji1

撞機.definition: (of an airplane) to collide (with another plane midair); to crash

撞死.definition: to knock down and kill (with a car, train etc)

撞爛.definition: to destroy by smashing; smashed up

撞臉.definition: (coll.) to look alike; to be a spitting image of

撞衫.definition: to wear the same outfit as sb else (in public)

撞車.definition: to crash (into another car); (fig.) (of opinions, schedules etc) to clash; (of subject matter) to be the same

撞運氣.definition: to try one's luck; to rely on fate

撞鬼.definition: to encounter a ghost or supernatural being; (coll.) to experience sth strange, eerie or unlucky
